document_data.caption: A map showing Vice Street in southeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Vice Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Vice Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Vice Street was located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] in the southeast section of Zhentil Keep. The road curved through the far southeast corner of the city, branching south from [[Battle Way]] and joining with [[Alley Way]] and [[Border Street]] near the [[North Tesh Gate]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentilar]] guardpost was located on Vice Street.
